revision.text: The '''Poké Ball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector.
revision.comment: FuzzyBot moved page [[Translations:Pokéball/6/en]] to [[Translations:Poké Ball/6/en]] without leaving a redirect: Part of translatable page "Pokéball"
